settings.quiz_description: Complete our 3-minute Free hearing Test to get personalized results.
settings.intro_point_1: Start the Free Test and answer few questions
settings.intro_disclaimer: *This test is a screener designed to give you general information about your hearing. It is not a diagnostic test or medical assessment.
settings.find_place_description: Background noise (people talking, street traffic, or loud fans) can affect results.
settings.connect_headphone_title: Connect your headphone or earbuds. Set your device volume to 100%
settings.connect_headphone_description: How do I set my device volume?
settings.loudest_level_instruction: Click the +/- buttons to reach the LOUDEST level you can listen to without discomfort (e.g. you could listen to it for 15 minutes)
settings.understand_level_instruction: Click the +/- buttons until the person is speaking just loud enough to understand.
settings.barely_hear_instruction: Click the +/- buttons until you can barely hear the sound.
settings.headphones_heading: Connect your headphones and set your device volume to 100%
settings.switch_to_left_ear_text: Now let's test your left ear
settings.results_email_sent: A copy was sent to your email
settings.calculate_results_text: How do you calculate my results?
settings.perfect_hearing_subtext: Enjoy uninterrupted family time with nearly invisible Ceretone hearing aids.
settings.significant_loss_heading: Significant Hearing Loss May Be Detected
settings.significant_loss_subtext: Immediate action can help you regain your hearing abilities and improve your daily interactions.
settings.potential_improvement_text: Potential improvement with a hearing device*
settings.lower_volume_text: Enter your email below to get your results
settings.left_ear_improvement_text: This is how your hearing in your left ear could improve with help from a hearing device*.
settings.right_ear_improvement_text: This is how your hearing in your right ear could improve with help from a hearing device*.
settings.volume_popup_heading: How to set my device volume?
settings.volume_popup_description: Select your device type below to learn how to set the volume to 100%.
settings.windows_volume_instructions: Click the speaker icon on the bottom-right of the taskbar. Slide the bar right to the end.
settings.mac_volume_instructions: Use the F11 and F12 keys on the keyboard to adjust the volume. Stop when the volume bar is full.
settings.mobile_volume_instructions: Use the buttons on the left-hand side to adjust volume. Stop when the bar is full.
settings.both_ears_popup_description: We recommend starting again with another pair of headphones and/or using a different device. Continuing the hearing test with your current headphones and device will likely impact the quality of your results.
settings.restart_button_text: Start again with another pair of headphones
settings.continue_button_text: Continue with current headphones and device
settings.calculate_popup_heading: How do you calculate my results?
settings.calculate_popup_description_1: We calculate your results by combining your answers to our questions with your hearing check.
settings.calculate_popup_description_2: Your answers to our questions help us understand where you struggle most. This helps us estimate both the likelihood of hearing loss, and the hearing difficulties you might encounter.
settings.calculate_popup_description_3: The hearing check helps us get a more specific assessment of your hearing.
settings.dont_hear_popup_description: First, let's check your setup: make sure your headphones are connected and your device volume is not muted.
